author: Gary Fenster
comment: This app so far appears to give you almost an unlimited number of entries of liquid intake. All different amounts of your choosing, with a variety of drinking glasses and cups available. Plus it has a pleasing colorful interface. It is my present choice and recommended app for keeping a record of my water consumption.

author: Honest News Network
comment: This app developer is very deceiving. They make it seem as though there is a widget for you smart watch when their is no widget. This app offers no reminder on smart watch for drinking water.

author: Simon Björkman
comment: Now I will be sure I have had enough hydration because I can easily forget and in my condition that is very bad, hopefully I can avoid yet another trip to the hospital from dehydration with the help of this app.

author: Jang Wook Kwon
comment: Intuitive interface with a helpful notification system.  The usefulness factor is bumped up a notch due to its synchronization with Samsung Fitness.

author: Cameron Harkless
comment: Great app! Love how you can add any amount you want! I can accurately track my daily intake.

author: Desril Arman
comment: Good

author: Andrej Zupančič
comment: Really nice app for hydration, and I have tried a lot. Good graphics, intuitive, user friendly. Even the free version is quite OK, but the PRO version is definitelly worth the small fee. I have now uninstalled all other hydration apps I was trying out and I'm sticking with this one.  Update: After using this app for a few months, I'm now convinced it is not just "nice", but actually the best I've tried so far!

author: Parsa L
comment: Waow! It changed my whole life! I suggest this to any Alzheimer patient who unfortunately lost the ability to remember to drink. A wonderful product, totally worth the cost! I can feel dehydration flowing through my legs, arms and even soul.

author: Wayne Whiting
comment: Not a bad app however 1 star removed as sync with Samsung Health does not work as decribed. And a further star deducted as the dev continues to ignore support requests regarding said sync issue. Poor form Leap Fitness Group particuarly as I paid for the app. I will be looking for a better app that can work as document and the dev respects their users and bothers to respond to support requests.

author: Francisco Ramos Zavala
comment: App does a great job at what it does. The best things about this app are it's integration with S Health, UI and customization. S Health integration is really great and the ability to customize what it can and can't read/write is awesome. The customization is really great and I love it! Custom notifications and water intake size. UI is beautiful and easy to navigate. This has been helpful in keeping track of how much water I intake and making sure I drink enough.

author: lesley diedrich
comment: Love this app.  It only cost me $.20 a few years ago. This app reminds me every hour to drink a little, to get to my 3 litres a day

author: Timothy Galea
comment: Quick & Easy Smarter Tracking. Perfect pairing with Android wear! It is much easier to get past the laziness barrier and record as you drink when it is right there on your wrist :) also sync on offer with Google fit, Samsung health.

author: Md. Ashraful Alam
comment: Very good app and very useful. It reminds me when I need to drink water. Otherwise I would not have drink enough water daily.

author: T Perley
comment: I wish my watch could update the app. When I click the drink icon on my Samsung Gear S2 watch, it doesn't update the app, and I still have to open my phone.

author: Magda Le Roux
comment: Love the app from the beginning.  No advertisements and straight forward, no complications.  Thanks for a  wonderful working App

author: Piper Achhammer
comment: Just what I needed to track my water intake.  Love that I can mute the alarm if I am ahead of schedule.

author: Joseph Barney
comment: Works great plus it keeps track of my weight. I like how it syncs with my Samsung Health app!

author: Anar Gurbani
comment: Would like to see Fitbit sync

author: Steve Hardy
comment: Simple to use and notifications/widgets work great with Samsung S8+ and Gear 3 watch.

author: Akila Barrett
comment: Not working with my Samsung gear fit 2. Just give a reminder. I need a refund

author: Barbara Miller
comment: Easy to use. Keeps Me on track.

author: B Leggie
comment: Excellent app.  I'm drinking plenty. Just like I should

author: Pedro Almeida
comment: Great Walter reminder!!! Made me lose weight!

author: R0N
comment: Okay, but needs more features!!
A good reminder for vusy people

author: Monica Hill
comment: I really enjoy it!!!

author: Andrea Suatoni
comment: Nice!

author: Pamela Crawford
comment: Love it!

author: Ali Mevlit
comment: Brilliant

author: Craig Ogier
comment: Great app. Recommended. Would love to see an option for more drink customisation, juice, wine, cordials etc as I also track this to limit sugar and caffeine intake. Also the feedback button currently does nothing in the app

author: Debopriyo Basu
comment: FREE version is updated regularly while the pro version is left since sep 2016. The worst thing you could do

author: Kristy Creel
comment: Have not been using it long, but it does work well. Not a major concern, but would love to be able to customize reminders (text, not just times).
title: So far so good...

author: Qasim Mustafa Ali
comment: I love the app very much but I think there's something missing. When I'm outside I usually drink bottled water which have a barcode. It would really help if I scanned that and all the info like the ml or oz of the water would be entered automatically.

author: Kk Lee
comment: It send notification to my gear 3, but not able to update.  Have to use my phone to input water record. Already purchased the water pro, still not working.
title: Not support with Samsung gear 3

author: Ray Buettner
comment: I truly loved the free version, and it's integration with S-Health. They work together to make sure your reminded to care for you, because no one else will.  Super Job !!
title: Great app for health

author: priscilla costen
comment: What a great little gadget I love it and it really  been helpful to me I have went all day some time for days either no drinking water or thinking about it, it has been really helpful with my weight lost indiver
title: My little water helper!

author: Randy feldman
comment: Nice app.  Just needs to fix auto sync with S Health so I dont have to keep opening item to sync from Samsung Gear Fit 2

author: Frank AL
comment: Very nice app. I would like if this support Fit bit hint, hint. Over all this is one of the best water app in the play store thank you

author: Mohamed Alzaabi
comment: The app does not sync across devices although it's connected to google account
title: Sync across devices

author: bryan jowett
comment: Stop telling me to upgrade to the free app with advertising
